title: A Treatise of Human Nature
fulltitle:
A

TREATISE

OF

Human Nature :

BEING

An Attempt to introduce the experimental Method of Reasoning

INTO

MORAL SUBJECTS.

Rara temporum felicitas, ubi sentire, quæ velis ; & quæ sentias, dicere licet. Tacit.
